author: crossley
msg: The "debug" log target was not being used by our previous Cocoon-2.2
and we were using that target for "sitemap-execution" messages at level DEBUG..
Now with Cocoon-2.1 it does use the "debug" target. So we were getting verbose.
The last commit added a specific "sitemap-execution" target, so now setting the
